response.original_title: An Inconvenient Time – The Story of Ruth Ravina
response.overview: “An Inconvenient Time” tells the odyssey through the Holocaust of Ruth Ravina, who was two years old when Germany invaded Poland in 1939 and lived through three concentration camps by the age of seven. Hers is a story of survival and triumph.
response.title: An Inconvenient Time – The Story of Ruth Ravina
